item.description:
The Boston/MIT chapter of Asha for Education is pleased to present its annual Carrom Competition, following a thrilling debut tournament last year. Once again we will be bringing the game of carrom to crowds of excited newbies and nostalgic experts alike -- so start exercising your striking finger!

Whether you grew up with a carrom striker in your hand or simply have an exceptional understanding of physics, come battle it out for the title of Carrom Champion 2013!


Register soon as spaces are limited! (Singles $10, Doubles $15 per team)

For more details: http://www.ashanet.org/mit/events/2013/carrom/
More on the Boston/MIT chapter of Asha for Education: www.ashanet.org/mit

All proceeds from this event will support Asha's education projects in India.

Please checkout the Facebook page : https://www.facebook.com/events/151244108385410/
item.name: Asha Carrom Tournament 2013
